text: McDonald's Privacy Policy
Update and release date: June 29, 2022 Effective Date: June 29, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Foreword:
Thank you for your trust in the McDonald's brand!
Jin Arch (China) Co., Ltd. (China) (McDonald's China ", the registered address is Room 108, Building 1, Building 2, No. 2121, Longteng Avenue, Xuhui District, Shanghai;
label: Contact Information

text: McDonald's China has attached great importance to the personal information and privacy of protecting users ("You").

To this end, we hope to help you better understand through "McDonald's Privacy Policy" (referred to as "this policy"). When you visit or use our products or services or participate in our activities, how do we handle your personal informationAnd the way we provide access, correction, delete and protect these personal information.

We will operate and manage websites ("McDonald's Website" in the mainland), mobile applications (including McDonald's official app, McDonald's official applet, I McDonald's happy small member applet, etc., collectively referred to as "McDonald's Application"),Third -party online service platform (including McDonald's Tmall flagship store, Alipay McDonald's official member store, McDonald's Douyin official store, Meituan comment official store, WeChat public account and other platforms, referred to as "other third -party online platform services";
With the McDonald's website, McDonald's application is collectively referred to as "network platform") to provide you with products or services.

Before using the products or services we provide, read carefully and fully understand this policy (the key content we have bolded the font, please pay special attention), and make a proper choice you think.

If you have any questions or questions about this policy or related issues related to this policy, or make a complaint or report, you can contact the personal information protection team of McDonald's China Data Management Office (email: enquiry@cn.mcd.com), weWill answer or deal with you as soon as possible.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Email: enquiry@cn.mcd.com

text: The theme content of each section in this policy is as follows:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How can we share, transfer, and disclose your personal information
3. How do we store and protect your personal information
4. How do you manage your personal information
5. Privacy protection of minors
6. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
7. Provide and link to other websites to other websites
8. The renewal and scope of this policy
Nine, scope of applicable and applicable laws
10. Contact us and solve disputes
1. How do we collect and use your personal information

We will follow the principles of legal, correctness, necessary, and integrity. For the following goals described in this policy, collect and use personal information that you actively provide or use our services during the use of services.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will follow the principles of legality, justice, necessary, and integrity, and collect and use your personal information for the purpose of this policy.

text: If we want to use your personal information for other purposes or scenarios that are not stated in this policy, or use the information collected for other purposes based on specific purposes, we will inform you in a reasonable way and obtain it again.Your consent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If we exceed the scope of this policy or collect information based on specific purposes, we will inform you and obtain your consent.

text: You can check the details in Appendix II "Personal Information Collection List".

When you use our products or services, your personal information we need or may need to collect and use contains two situations: the first, in order to realize the basic service function of providing you with our product or service, you must authorize us to authorize usCollect and use necessary information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide, you will not be able to use our products or services normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: The second is the information that the additional service function may need to be collected: this information is the information required for non -basic service functions, you can choose whether to authorize us to collect it.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide, it will cause the additional service function to be unable to achieve or cannot achieve the effect we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your normal use of basic service functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. Member account registration and login

1.1, when you use McDonald's and register as our members, you need to provide mobile phone numbers to create McDonald's membership account. At the same time, we may verify your identity by sending a SMS verification code to help you complete the registration.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number and think that you create a member account, and at the same time to verify your identity to help you complete the registration.

text: If you only need to use browse and search services, you don't need to register members and provide the above information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Only browse and search services do not require registered members and provide mobile phone numbers.

text: 1.2, use the one -click login function when you register or log in to the account. After your consent, and based on our cooperation with the supplier, we will collect your mobile phone number and network operator information, and will the mobile phone number of your device will be collected.As your registration or login, you can provide you with fast registration and login service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: After authorization, collect your mobile phone number and network operator information and think that you use a one -click recording function.

text: If you don't want to use a one -click login function, you can choose to register and log in to McDonald's member account.

1.3, when you register with a third -party platform account or log in to McDonald's application, we will obtain your third -party platform account information from the third -party platform under the premise of obtaining your authorization consent, including the mobile phone you provided to the platform to the platform.The number, as well as the only identification, nickname, avatar, and other information you authorized on the platform, and bind this information with the McDonald's account to identify your identity and facilitate your quick registration or login.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, access and collect your personal information after your authorization, and bind it.

text: 1.4, if you have registered McDonald's membership account, you need to bind the third -party platform account with the McDonald's account, and we will get you from this third -party platform on the premise of obtaining your authorization consent.The unique logo, nickname, avatar, mobile phone number and other information you who preserved the third -party platform that are preserved;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you bind your third -party platform account with McDonald's account, collect the unique logo, nickname, avatar, mobile phone number or other information of the user authorized by your authorized third -party platform.

text: If you do not bind, it will not affect your McDonald's member identity, but McDonald's products and/or services you spend on the third -party platform will not be able to accumulate points under the McDonald's member account.
1.5, when you edit your personal information page, you can fill in or modify your member's nickname, avatar, gender and birth date to improve your member information.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can fill in or modify your membership nickname, avatar, gender and birth date through personal information page.

text: You can not provide this information, and it will not affect your basic service functions of your network platform.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (All the information the above constitutes your member account information)

In addition, when you register, if you actively check the "Join CITIC Youxiang+" option at the same time, we will transmit your mobile phone number to CITIC Technology Development Co., Ltd. ("CITIC Technology")Complete the user registration of CITIC Youxiang+, and CITIC Technology will provide you with CITIC Youxiang+related services and use you in accordance with the "CITIC Youxiang+User Service Agreement" and "CITIC Youxiang+Privacy Policy".Information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you register, if you actively check the "Join CITIC Youxiang+" option at the same time, your number will be shared with CITIC Technology Development Co., Ltd. to complete CITIC Youxiang+registration.

text: Please read the terms and contents of the CITIC Youxiang+User Service Agreement and "CITIC Youxiang+Privacy Policy", and make a choice you think.
If you do not check the "Join CITIC Youxiang+" option, it will not affect your use of McDonald's network platform services based on this privacy policy.
2. Provide you with order or food delivery service

2.1, when you apply through the McDonald's application and use the meal function, we will collect your order information (such as order number, content or service ordered, order time, service store, amount you should pay and payment methods you pay and payment methods you should payTo.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the meal function, we will collect your order information.

text: To facilitate you to quickly find nearby restaurants, under your consent, we will collect your geographical information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your authorized geographical information so that you can quickly find nearby restaurants.

text: 2.2, when you use the meal delivery service of Magle, we will collect the names, mobile phone numbers, receiving address, and order information of you or your designated consignee.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the names of you or your designated consignee, mobile phone number, receiving address, and order information to provide food delivery services.

text: To facilitate you to quickly find nearby restaurants, under your consent, we will collect your geographical information.

We need to share the consignee information (name, mobile phone number, address), and the necessary information in order information to share with our third -party partners (including delivery platforms, third -party distribution companies and technical partners)The order can be delivered normally.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will share with the necessary information in the cooperative third -party shared consignee information and the necessary information in the order information to make the order be delivered normally.

text: 3. Provide you with services to buy, use card vouchers or other goods

3.1, when you purchase, exchange or consumer card coupons, we will collect the name of the card vouchers you purchased and/or accept, the date of your purchase and/or receiving card, your card voucher information and your username name
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you buy, exchange or consumer card coupons, collect the name of the card coupon, the date of purchase and/or accepting the card, the card voucher information and your username.

text: 3.2, when you buy our single -purpose commercial prepaid card or use services related to the single -purpose business prepaid card on our online platform, according to the requirements of national laws and regulations, we may also provide you with real -name information.Generally include your phone number and name.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you buy a single -purpose commercial prepaid card or use services related to the single -purpose business prepaid card, we may ask you to provide real -name information (including phone numbers and names).

text: Please remind you to remind you to pay attention to the agreement or explanation of the corresponding prepaid card charter.
4. Provide you with event participation services

4.1, if you use the party reservation function booking activities, we will collect your contact telephone number, order information (such as order number, content or service ordered, order time, service store, activity time, amount and amount you should pay and the amount and amount you should pay, the amount and the amount you should pay and the amount and amount you should pay and the amount and the amount you should pay and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount and the amount you pay.payment method).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you use the party booking function booking activity, collect your contact telephone number and order information.

text: In particular, when you help your child register as a McDonald's happy little member through the WeChat mini program of "I McDonald's Happy Member", we will also ask you to provide your child's nickname, gender, date of birth, relationship with you and your relationship, and your relationship and your relationship.The store enters the store so that you and your children can participate in the birthday party and theme party we organized. At the same time, it is convenient for us to prepare related items in advance and prepare offline party activities.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When your child is registered as a small member of McDonald's, collect your children's nicknames, gender, birth date and your relationship and enter the store in order to provide birthday meetings and themes.

text: You can learn how we collect the personal information of the small member of the happy little member by checking the "Happy Little Member Registration".

If you participate in other interactive activities we may hold, with your consent, we may also ask you to provide additional information. Please shall notify the relevant public information or activity page.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 4.2 In the scenario of McDonald's official applets and Alipay McDonald's official store, we will put welfare or participating in marketing activities through the third -party platform where the applet is located.

To this end, if you are a user of these third -party platforms, you need to register or bind your McDonald's member account through these third -party platform accounts to receive relevant member benefits or participate in marketing activities.

To this end, for the purpose of protecting your legitimate rights and interests, preventing fraud, etc., when receiving member welfare or participating in marketing activities, you agree and authorize us to obtain and transmit your third -party platform users from these third -party platforms.The logo, as well as the collection of membership welfare and the information of the nuclear sales.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When receiving membership benefits or participating in marketing activities, collect and transmit the unique logo of your third -party platform user authorized by you, as well as the collection and verification information of member welfare.

text: 4.3, if you participate in online marketing activities we organize, with your consent, we may collect your name, mobile phone number, receiving address (referred to as "activity information"), to verify your identity, or or to verify your identity, orTo redeem the prize from you in time, we need to share the necessary information in your activity information with the third -party partner (such as communication operators and third -party distribution platforms).
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you participate in online marketing activities, collect the names, mobile phone numbers, and receiving addresses authorized by your authorization to verify your identity or redeem the prize and share the necessary information with a third party.

text: Refusing to provide you only affects your participation in related activities, but it will not affect your normal use of other functions or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Refusing to provide your activity information will only affect your participation in related activities, but it will not affect the use of other functions or services.

text: 4.4, if you participate in a survey, investigation or interact with us in various ways, we will collect your relevant information and information related to the theme you may be interested in on the basis of obtaining your consent.Essence
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you interact with us, we will collect your relevant information and information related to the topic you may be interested in.

text: 5. Provide you with services to pay, recharge and invoicing

5.1 When you place an order or recharge, you can choose the payment services provided by the third -party payment institutions (such as Alipay, WeChat Pay, UnionPay, etc., which are collectively referred to as "payment institutions, etc.) provided by our payment services.

In order to realize the needs of payment services, we will collect and share your order number and transaction amount with these payment institutions, the following payment instructions and help you complete the payment.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you place an order or recharge, we will collect your order number and transaction amount and share with your selected payment institutions to help you complete the payment.

text: 5.2, when you open our McDonald's wallet function on our network platform, you must set a trading password to ensure that your transaction is safe.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Please set a trading password for McDonald's wallet!

text: (Article 2-5 The information described all constitutes your "order information")
6. Provide you with customer service and after -sales service

6.1, our customer service will use your membership account information and order information, and other information disclosed in the process of contact with the customer service, in order to contact you or help you solve the problem, or record the processing scheme and results of related issues, or to record related issues and results. Or handle your complaints and reports.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Use your membership account information and order information and other information disclosed in the process of communicating with customer service to help you solve problems, process complaints and reports, etc.

text: In addition, in order to ensure your account and transaction security, our customer service may use your membership information, order information, name, contact phone number and address to verify your identity with you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Customer service may use your member account information, order information, name, contact phone number and address to check you.

text: In addition, when you communicate with our customer service staff, we will depend on the specific situation, and may require you to provide reasonable and necessary additional information to further respond to your needs, verify your identity, or handle your complaints and reports.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you communicate with our customer service personnel, we may need some reasonable additional information depending on the specific situation.

text: 7. Provide you a message notification service

7.1, you can obtain information, marketing activities, and other service information related to your order status through the message notification service (including SMS, application push, APP messages, and public account messages).
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: You can obtain information, marketing activities, and other service information related to your order status through message notification services.

text: We may collect and use your contact information, order information, equipment information, and share the necessary information in the above information with the supplier of the designated message notification service at the designated information in order to provide you with a message notification service.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use your contact information, order information, equipment information, and sharing the necessary information in the above information with the supplier of the message notification service in order to provide you with a message notification service.

text: If you don't want to accept this kind of information or message we sent you, you can reply to "TD" (or other displayed instructions displayed) to cancel the reception of such mobile phone text messages and turn off the relevant notification permissions through the mobile phone to close the network from the networkPush messages on the platform, or close the APP station message or public account message prompt.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can reply to "TD" to cancel the reception of such mobile phone text messages. Turn off the relevant notification permissions through the mobile phone to close the push message from the network platform, or close the APP station message or public account message prompt.

text: 8. Provide you information search and display service

8.1, you can find the goods or services you need by searching. We will collect and use your search content and search records to facilitate the quickly matching you what you needCan improve our products and services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use your search content and search records in order to provide you with personalized recommendation services and improve products and services.

text: 9. Provide you with personalized recommendation services

During your use of the network platform, to provide you with personalized services, or to ensure that you can know more suitable content, we may collect and use your location information, membership account information, order information, equipment information and other otherService log information related to our products and services (including browsing records, click to view records, search query records, transaction information, IP addresses, browser types, telecommunications operators, use language, access date and time, etc.), and youIn the interaction with us, our affiliates, and our partners, we can get other relevant information that we can get through your authorization.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use your location information, membership account information, order information, equipment information, service log information, and other information that you authorize to provide you with personalized services or more suitable content.

text: You can also choose to close the recommendation service, you can go to [I]-[Settings]-[Personalized options] to close the personalized recommendation mechanism.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Turn off the personalized recommendation mechanism through [I]-[Settings]-[Personalized Options].

text: 10. Provide you with security services

For the purpose of security risk control, to ensure the operation environment safety and the abnormal state of the membership account, better protect the safety of you or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computersSecurity risks such as viruses, network attacks, and network invasion, and more accurately identify the situation of violating laws and regulations or the rules of the relevant agreement of McDonald's. We may use or integrate your location information, membership account information, order information, equipment information (equipment model, operation, operation, operation, operationSystem version, device settings, MAC address, hardware serial number and other software and hardware feature information, IMEI/Android, ID/IDFA/OpenUDID/Guid/OAID/OAID, SIM card IMSI, ICCID and other device identifiers, application lists, WIFI, andNetwork status, IP address, operator information, etc.) and other service log information related to our products and services, as well as information from our partners to obtain or shared by your partners to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, and verify identity verification, Testing and preventing safety incidents, and adopting necessary records, investigations, audits, analysis, and treatment measures in accordance with the law.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: For the purpose of security risk control, we use or integrate your location information, membership account information, order information, equipment information, service log information, and other information that you authorize to judge accounts and transaction risks, verify, prevent security incidentswait.

text: If you do not agree with us to record the aforementioned information, you may not be able to complete the risk control verification
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If you do not agree with us to record location information, membership account information, order information, equipment information, service log information, and other information that you have authorized, you may not be able to complete risk control verification.

text: 11. We may collect personal information indirectly

In order to ensure your account security, confirm the transaction status, and provide you with the purpose of providing after -sales and dispute resolution, we may obtain your personal information from a third party (for example, Paying institutions, etc., such as your transaction, payment, booking and other information related to the transaction progress, in order to facilitate us to handle your orders and ensure the smooth completion of services, or better prevent malicious behaviors such as fraud and order).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may collect your personal information from a third party to ensure account security, confirm the transaction status, and provide after -sales and dispute resolution.

text: We will obtain your information from our partners in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations and the agreement with third parties.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 12. Provide other additional services for you to call you rights limit
When you interact with us and use the following additional functions, we may collect and use your personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you interact with us and use additional functions, we may collect and use your personal information.

text: If you do not provide this information, you may not be able to use the additional functions or services that can be brought to you, but it will not affect the basic services or functions you provide for you.

text: These additional functions include:
12.1 Information displayed based on geographical location: After you are authorized, we will collect the location information you generate during our service.

First Party Collection Information

text: When you enable the positioning function of the mobile device through the system and use the service provided by the location information, we will collect and use your location information (including the GPS location information you have authorized and the WLAN access point, Bluetooth and base station sensor information information) To provide you, implement, or recommend related services (for example, you do not need to manually enter the geographical location where you can locate or obtain related services, estimate the actual distance between the McDonald's store and you).

Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you authorize to open the positioning function and use the service provided by location information, we will collect and use your location information to provide you, implement or recommend related services for you.

text: You can turn off the positioning settings in your device's system to stop the collection of our location information, but it may not be able to use the services we provide for you based on geographical location, or to achieve the expected effect of related services.
label: Important
Edit/Control

Important

text: If you choose not to open this permissions, you will not be able to use this specific function, but it does not affect the other services we use among the small members.

Important
rewrite: If you do not open the permissions of the calendar, it will only affect the appointment and reminder service, but it does not affect other services.

text: 12.5, additional functions authorized by microphone: You can choose to turn on the microphone rights and communicate online with customer service through voice functions.

Important
rewrite: You can choose to turn on the microphone right to communicate online with customer service through voice functions.

text: If you choose not to turn on the microphone permission, you will not be able to use the specific voice customer service service, but it will not affect your customer service in other ways.

Important
rewrite: If you choose not to turn on Macing, you will not use this specific voice customer service service.

text: The above permissions will not be opened by default.

Important

text: Even after your authorization, we have obtained these permissions, and we will only collect your information at the time of related functions or services.

Important
rewrite: Even after your authorization, we have obtained geographical location, album, camera, microphone, and calendar permissions, and we will only collect your information at the time of related functions or services.

text: For more detailed instructions for the use of more detailed equipment permissions, please refer to the following "McDonald's Application Equipment Perseverance Instructions"
13. Exception of obtaining authorization consent
Please understand that according to laws and regulations, we handle your personal information in the following situation without obtaining your authorization consent:

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

label: Important

text: 13.3, to deal with emergencies, or in urgent situations for protecting the health and property security of natural people;

First Party Collection Information

text: 13.4, implement news reports, public opinion supervision and other behaviors for public interests, and handle personal information within a reasonable range;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 13.5, deal with personal information that personal information that has been disclosed by itself or other legal disclosure within a reasonable scope in accordance with the "Personal Information Protection Law";

First Party Collection Information

text: 13.6, other circumstances stipulated in laws and administrative regulations.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: 14. McDonald's application equipment authority call for calling

Our access to your various equipment is to provide you with services and ensure your account security. After your authorization, we will turn on the relevant permissions, and you can cancel the authorization at any time in the system.

Permission Acquisition

Please note that unless there is another instructions, you will open the right of one authority, which means that you authorize us to collect and use relevant personal information to provide you with corresponding services. Once you close the right of power, it means that you cancel the authorization.Continue to collect and use relevant personal information based on the corresponding permissions, nor can you provide you with the services corresponding to the permissions.

Important

Close the authority to cancel the authorization representative, and no longer continue to collect and use relevant information based on the corresponding permissions.

text: However, your decision to close permissions will not affect the collection and use of information based on your authorization.

Important
rewrite: Close authority will not affect the collection and use of information based on authorization.

text: (1) The acquisition of system authority for various business functions of the APP is as follows as follows
Storage: It is used to cache the text, images, logs and other content generated by you during the use of the McDonald's APP to ensure the normal display and operation of the McDonald's APP content.

Important

text: Location: For automatic positioning, searching restaurant, service recommendations based on locations, and participating in interactive activities. If you choose not to open this permission, you will not be able to automatically locate, will not receive recommendations based on the location of the location, and you cannot participate in the location of the location.Activities based on locations, but do not affect other services provided by your McDonald's APP.

Important

text: Camera and album: scan code, send and store photos or videos.

Important

2. How can we share, transfer, and disclose your personal information
1. How do we share your personal information
For your personal information, we only collect and use within the purpose and scope of the privacy policy or in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, and strictly keep secret.

text: Under normal circumstances, we will not share your personal information with any company, organization and individual, except the following situations:

text: 3. How do we store and protect your personal information
1. Storage location
The personal information we collected and generated in the People's Republic of China are stored in the territory of the People's Republic of China.

label: Data Retention

label: Data Retention
Important

text: 3. Storage safety
3.1 Safety protection measures
label: Data Security

text: We attach great importance to your personal information security.

To this end, we are committed to adopting various types of security protection measures, including establishing reasonable information security management policies and implementing security technologies to reduce your personal information as much as possible., Risk of damage and deletion.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The risk of unauthorized access, use, modification, disclosure, damage, and deletion of unauthorized access, use, modification, disclosure, damage, and deletion of your personal information is adopted.

text: These measures include but not limited to:
label: Data Security

text: (1) In the process of information transmission, we can encrypt the information you entered by using network security layer software (SSL) to reduce the risk of being intercepted by the information you entered;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use network security layer software to encrypt the input information.

text: (2) When transmitting and storing personal sensitive information, we adopt various types of encryption, permissions control, de -identification and other security measures to ensure the safety of transmission and storage;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The use of various types of encryption, permissions control, de -identification and other security measures to ensure the safety of transmission and storage.

text: (3) We have strictly controlled the access of our user data platform to prevent your information from being accepted and used by unauthorized access;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The access permissions of the user data platform are strictly controlled and controlled to prevent unauthorized access and use.

text: (4) We have set up information security full -time teams to promote and ensure personal information security, and have established various policies and processes related to data classification, data security management, data security development, emergency response and other related processes to manage and standardize individualsInformation storage and use.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: A full -time information security team and policies and processes related to data classification, data security management, data security development, emergency response and other related policies and processes are established to ensure personal information security.

text: 3.2 Personal information security incident
We have formulated an early warning mechanism and emergency plan in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Early warning mechanisms and emergency plans were formulated.

text: If our physical, technical, or management protection facilities are damaged, and the information is caused by unauthorized access, public disclosure, tampering or destruction, and damage to your legitimate rights and interests, we will launch an emergency plan in time and take reasonable and necessary measures.In order to reduce the impact on your personal.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Start the emergency plan in a timely manner to deal with safety events, and take reasonable and necessary measures to reduce the impact on your personal impact as much as possible.

text: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will also inform you the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations.Remedy.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will inform you in SMS, telephone, push notification, and other reasonable channels that it is difficult to inform one by one. We will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The disposal of personal information security incidents will be reported in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: 5. Privacy protection of minors
We attach great importance to and are committed to protecting the privacy and personal information of minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: We will not take the initiative to collect their personal information directly to minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: But because birthdays are not information that must be provided, in some cases, we cannot recognize the age of users.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: In some cases, we cannot recognize the age of users.

text: If you are a minor, before you use any network platform and McDonald's service, be sure to obtain the consent of your guardian in advance.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a minor, please use our service after the guardian consent.

text: If your guardian does not agree that you use McDonald's China in accordance with this policy or provide your information to McDonald's China, please stop the registration account;
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If your guardian does not agree with this policy, please stop the registration account; if you have registered your account, please contact us.

text: If you have registered your account, please immediately terminate the use of McDonald's China and inform us in time in order to take appropriate measures.
label: Specific Audiences

text: If you are a guardian, you should correctly fulfill your duties and protect your personal information security;
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: The guardians are requested to perform their duties to protect the personal information security of minors.

label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: The guardian is requested to correctly guide and monitor the minor to register or use products or services.

label: Specific Audiences
Important

text: We will process and store personal information of minors in accordance with the agreement of this policy.
label: Specific Audiences

text: When the purpose, method, scope, storage matters, security measures, etc. stipulated in this policy have undergone substantial changes, we will once again obtain the consent of the guardian.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
Data Security
rewrite: When the purpose, method, scope, storage matters, security measures, etc. stipulated in this policy have undergone substantial changes, we will once again obtain the consent of the guardian.

text: The purpose, method, and scope of our personal information of minors will not exceed the content of our policy in this policy.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: We only collect and use the personal information of minors within the purpose, methods, and scope of the policy.

text: In addition, before the clear consent of the guardian, we will not share, transfer, and publicly disclose the personal information of minors to third parties.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: We shared, transferred, and publicly disclosed the personal information of minors to obtain the guardian's clear consent in advance.

text: The guardian or minor himself can correct and delete personal information in accordance with the methods provided by this policy.
label: Edit/Control
Specific Audiences

text: If minors or guardians discover that we who violate laws, administrative regulations or the privacy policy to handle personal information of minors, or if the guardian withdraws the consent, or terminates the use of products or services through cancellationDelete personal information of adults.

Specific Audiences
Important

text: 7. Provide and link to other websites to other websites
Our websites, applications, etc. may contain links to third -party websites, products and services.
Our services may also use or provide products or services from third -party platforms.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: These third parties may collect, use and handle your personal information, but may not follow the provisions of this policy, or there may be regulations that are opposite to this policy.

Risk

If you find that these third -party websites, products and services are risky, please terminate the relevant operations to avoid infringing your rights and interests.

Data Security

text: 8. Update of this policy
The update date shown in this policy is updated and effective.
label: Policy Change

text: Although this policy is the general privacy clause that we can uniformly apply, some specific services will apply specific privacy policies, and the privacy policy of these specific services constitutes part of the cost of the cost of composition.
label: Policy Change

text: If any specific service privacy policy is inconsistent with this policy, the privacy policies of these specific services should be applied.
label: Policy Change

text: We will update this policy from time to time.
Without your consent, we will not limit the rights you should enjoy in accordance with this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: After updating the privacy policy, without your clear consent, we will not restrict the rights you should enjoy in accordance with this policy.

text: If we update this policy, we will publish updated versions on our official website's designated link (https://www.mcdonalds.com.cn/pridacy-policy).
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: We will publish updated versions on https://www.mcdonalds.com.cn/page/privacy-policy.

text: If such updates have caused the substantial reduction or major changes of your rights under this policy, we will prompt or send you a message to you or notify you in other ways before this policy takes effect, and re -obtain your consent again Essence
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If the update of the privacy policy has caused the essence of your rights to reduce or change major changes, we will notify you and re -obtain your consent.

text: The situation of "major changes" includes but not limited to
label: Policy Change

text: (1) Our service model has changed significantly.
label: Policy Change

text: Such as the purpose of handling personal information, the type of personal information, the use of personal information, etc.;
label: Policy Change

text: (2) We have undergone major changes in the aspects of ownership structure and organizational structure.
label: Policy Change

text: Such as changes caused by business adjustments, bankruptcy mergers and acquisitions, etc.
label: Policy Change

text: (3) The main object of personal information sharing, transfer or public disclosure changes;
label: Policy Change

text: (4) The right to participate in personal information processing and its exercise methods have changed significantly;
label: Policy Change

text: (5) We are responsible for handling personal information security teams, contact methods and complaint channels;
label: Policy Change

text: (6) Evaluation report on personal information security impact indicates that there is a high risk.
label: Policy Change

text: Nine, scope and law
This policy is only applicable to continental regions except Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
This policy applies to the laws of the People's Republic of China (except the laws of conflict).
